DUNG NGUYEN 
IOS senior developer | IT technical architect 
Male | Single | Mar, 27 1984 
Skills Summary 
IOS Senior Developer | IT Technical Architect  
Good in logical thinking 
Good in research and analytics 
Good in analyze solutions 
Interested in new technology 
8 years’ experience in IOS developer (Objective C, Swift) 
2 years’ experience in Android developer (Java, Kotlin) 
1.5 years’ experience in Nodejs and MySQL 
1.5 years’ experience in Arduino, Esp8266 
Knowledge in hardware like MCU, sensor, Bluetooth, RF and MCU – Mobile communication

Mechatronics - Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (BACH KHOA HCM)
